question: My father who is 70 yrs old, has been a Type 2 diabetic for more than past 30 yrs controlled mostly with diet and oral antidiabetic drugs is recently diagnosed with TB lesion on chest XR, he also has a pacemaker for past 10 yrs.I would greatly apreciate help reg drug interactions, and management of TB in diabetics. He is currently on Rcinex.Thanks
title: Diabetes and TB
